hero.title: Your Google Ads AI Copilot that boosts your performance
hero.subtitle: Analysis, optimizations, and automated client reports
hero.description: Your AI copilot monitors your campaigns 24/7, identifies performance opportunities, and automatically optimizes your results. Focus on strategy, it handles execution.

problem.title: Your performance stagnates, your costs increase
problem.subtitle: Manual performance analysis takes too much time
problem.description: Between keyword analysis, ad group optimization, and bid monitoring, you spend hours on repetitive tasks. Your campaigns lose performance while you analyze data.

issues.timeManagement: You spend hours managing Google Ads accounts
issues.budgetWaste: with dozens of dashboards to follow.
issues.inconsistentCampaigns: Your campaigns are hard to track
issues.expensiveAgency: Client reports take long to create
issues.costlyAndTime: and waste your time in campaign management.

features.title: Your Google Ads AI Copilot
features.subtitle: Optimize your ROAS, boost your CTR, reduce your costs

aiGeneration.title: Automatic Quality Audit
aiGeneration.description: Your copilot scans your quality scores, identifies relevance issues, and suggests optimizations to improve your results.

analytics.title: Real-time Bid Optimization
analytics.description: Automatic adjustment of max CPC based on your target CPAs, competition, and conversion opportunities.

optimization.title: AI-Optimized Creatives
optimization.description: Generation of new ad variations based on your best historical CTR and conversion rates.

createCampaigns.title: Complete Audit and Campaign Creation
createCampaigns.subtitle: Identify issues and create campaigns in 2 minutes
createCampaigns.description: Complete scan of your Google Ads accounts with precise recommendations: keywords, ads, landing pages.

autoOptimize.title: Continuous Auto-Optimization
autoOptimize.subtitle: Bids, Budgets & Keywords
autoOptimize.description: Your AI copilot adjusts your campaigns to maximize account performance.

actionableInsights.title: Performance Reports
actionableInsights.subtitle: Actionable Recommendations Daily
actionableInsights.description: Receive alerts on performance variations, new negative keywords, and budget opportunities.

differentiation.title: Why Media Buyers Choose Flipika
differentiation.subtitle: Tools designed for your daily workflow
differentiation.description: Every feature is designed to simplify your media buyer work

notCopywritingTool.title: Not just an AI copywriting tool
notCopywritingTool.subtitle: A real media buyer copilot
notCopywritingTool.description: Flipika doesn't just write text. It analyzes, optimizes, and manages your campaigns like an expert assistant.

designedForMediaBuyers.title: Designed for Media Buyers
designedForMediaBuyers.subtitle: And only for them
designedForMediaBuyers.description: Every feature is designed to maximize your ROAS.

usesRealData.title: Uses YOUR real Google Ads data
usesRealData.subtitle: Via the secure Google Ads API
usesRealData.description: Flipika connects directly to your account for optimizations based on your metrics.

learnsAndImproves.title: Learns and improves with every campaign
learnsAndImproves.subtitle: Evolving AI
learnsAndImproves.description: The more you use Flipika, the better it understands your business and optimizes according to your goals.

comparison.title: Flipika vs Traditional Solutions
comparison.subtitle: Honest comparison of what makes us unique

differentiation.ctaSubtitle: Join thousands of media buyers optimizing with Flipika today.

testimonials.title: Concrete Results
testimonials.subtitle: Boosted performance thanks to their AI copilot

pierre.name: Pierre M.
pierre.content: My cost per acquisition decreased by 35% in 3 months. The copilot automatically optimizes my bids and I can finally focus on strategy.

julien.name: Julien R.
julien.content: My return on investment increased by 68% on my e-commerce campaigns. The copilot identifies opportunities I was missing before.

cookieConsent.message: We use cookies to improve your experience. By continuing to use our site, you agree to our use of cookies.

generalInfo.title: 1. General Information
generalInfo.content: This site is published by DISCO, a simplified joint-stock company (SAS) with a capital of 1000 euros, registered with the Paris RCS under number 927 707 836.
generalInfo.address: Headquarters: DISCO, 1 rue de Stockholm, 75008 Paris, France

hosting.title: 2. Hosting
hosting.content: The site is hosted by Google Cloud Platform
hosting.address: Google Ireland Limited, Gordon House, Barrow Street, Dublin 4, Ireland.

intellectualProperty.title: 3. Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.content1: All site content (texts, images, videos, logos, trademarks, etc.) is protected by French and international intellectual property laws.
intellectualProperty.content2: Any reproduction, representation, modification, adaptation, or exploitation, even partial, of this content is strictly prohibited without prior written authorization from Flipika.

personalData.title: 4. Personal Data
personalData.content1: Personal data collected on the site is used solely within the scope of services provided by Flipika, in accordance with our privacy policy.
personalData.content2: In accordance with GDPR, you have the right to access, rectify, delete, restrict, port, and object to your personal data.

cookies.title: 5. Cookies
cookies.content: The site uses cookies to improve user experience. By browsing the site, you accept the use of these cookies. You can configure your preferences at any time.

liability.title: 6. Limitation of Liability
liability.content1: Flipika strives to provide information as accurate as possible on the site but cannot be held responsible for any errors, omissions, or inaccuracies.
liability.content2: The site user acknowledges having verified the compatibility of their equipment with the site and that their technical capabilities allow for error-free access and use of the site and its services.

applicableLaw.title: 7. Applicable Law and Jurisdiction
applicableLaw.content: These legal notices are subject to French law. In case of dispute, an amicable solution will be sought. Failing that, the Paris courts will have sole jurisdiction.

contact.title: 8. Contact
contact.content: For any questions regarding these legal notices or the site in general, you can contact us at: flipika@gmail.com

introduction.title: 1. Introduction
introduction.content: At DISCO (operating as Flipika), protecting your personal data is our priority. This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, store, and protect your personal information in accordance with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) and the Data Protection Act.

whoWeAre.title: 2. Who we are
whoWeAre.content: The controller of your personal data is:
whoWeAre.address: Headquarters: DISCO, 1 rue de Stockholm, 75008 Paris, France

dataCollected.title: 3. Collected Data
dataCollected.identificationData: Identification information: name, first name, email
dataCollected.connectionData: Connection data: IP address, browser type
dataCollected.usageData: Usage data: pages visited, time spent on site
dataCollected.commercialData: Advertising data: connected Google Ads accounts
list: Identification information: name, first name, email
Professional information: company, position
Connection data: IP address, browser type
Usage data: pages visited, time spent on site
Advertising data: connected Google Ads accounts

legalBasis.title: 4. Legal Basis for Processing
legalBasis.content: We process your data on the following legal bases:
legalBasis.consent: Consent: for sending newsletters and marketing communications
legalBasis.contract: Contract: to provide our services and manage your account
legalBasis.legitimateInterest: Legitimate interest: to improve our services and prevent fraud
legalBasis.legalObligation: Legal obligation: to comply with our accounting and tax obligations
list: Consent: for sending newsletters and marketing communications
Contract: to provide our services and manage your account
Legitimate interest: to improve our services and prevent fraud
Legal obligation: to comply with our accounting and tax obligations

dataUsage.title: 5. Data Usage
dataUsage.marketing: Send you marketing communications (with your consent)
list: Provide and improve our services
Personalize your user experience
Send you marketing communications (with your consent)
Analyze usage of our service
Detect and prevent fraud
Comply with our legal obligations

dataRetention.title: 6. Data Retention
dataRetention.contactData: Contact data: 3 years after last contact
dataRetention.accountData: Account data: duration of your subscription + 3 years
list: Account data: duration of your subscription + 3 years
Billing data: 10 years (legal obligation)
Marketing data: until unsubscribe + 3 years
Connection data: 1 year
Support data: 3 years after ticket resolution

dataSharing.title: 7. Data Sharing
dataSharing.content: We only share your data with:
list: Google Ads (via their APIs, only with your consent)
Technical service providers (hosting, email)
Legal authorities (upon legal request)
Business partners (with your explicit consent)

dataSecurity.title: 8. Data Security
dataSecurity.content: We implement the following security measures:
list: Data encryption in transit and at rest
Two-factor authentication for administrator access
Regular data backups
Strict access controls
Regular security audit
Staff security training

yourRights.title: 9. Your Rights
yourRights.content: In accordance with GDPR, you have the following rights:
list: Right of access: consult your personal data
Right to rectification: correct inaccurate data
Right to erasure: request deletion of your data
Right to data portability: receive your data in a readable format
Right to object: object to the processing of your data
Right to restriction: limit the processing of your data
Right not to be profiled: not be subject to automated decision making
yourRights.exercise: To exercise these rights, contact us at: flipika@gmail.com

cookies.title: 10. Cookies and Similar Technologies
list: Essential functionalities (login, preferences)
Usage analytics (Google Analytics)
Personalized advertising (with consent)
Site performance
cookies.consent: You can manage your cookie preferences at any time via our preference center.
cookies.manage: You can manage your cookie preferences at any time via our preference center.

internationalTransfers.title: 11. International Transfers
internationalTransfers.content: Your data may be transferred to countries outside the EU. In this case, we guarantee:
list: Standard contractual clauses approved by the European Commission
Appropriate safeguards to protect your data
Enhanced security measures

policyChanges.title: 12. Policy Changes
policyChanges.content: We reserve the right to modify this policy at any time. Changes will be:
list: Communicated by email to registered users
Published on this page with the update date
Effective 30 days after publication

contact.title: 13. Contact
contact.content: For any questions regarding this privacy policy:
contact.address: Postal Address: DISCO - Privacy, 1 rue de Stockholm, 75008 Paris
contact.cnil: You also have the right to file a complaint with the CNIL: www.cnil.fr

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing and using the Flipika website (hereinafter "the Service"), you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not accept these terms, please do not use our Service.

serviceDescription.title: 2. Service Description
serviceDescription.content1: Flipika provides a platform for automation and optimization of Google Ads campaigns using artificial intelligence. The Service includes access to our platform, analytics tools, and AI-generated recommendations.
serviceDescription.content2: The Service is provided "as is" and may be modified, suspended, or discontinued at any time without notice.

accessConditions.title: 3. Access Conditions
accessConditions.content: Using the Service requires creating a user account. You agree to:
list: Provide accurate, complete, and up-to-date information during registration
Maintain the confidentiality of your connection credentials
Be responsible for all activities performed under your account
Immediately inform us of any unauthorized use of your account

authorizedUse.title: 4. Authorized Use
authorizedUse.content: You agree to use the Service only for lawful purposes and in accordance with these terms. It is prohibited to:
list: Use the Service in a way that violates applicable laws
Transmit viruses, malware, or any malicious code
Attempt to access unauthorized areas of the Service
Use robots, spiders, or other automated means without authorization
Collect personal data of other users without consent
Use the Service for spam or unsolicited communications
Display, copy, or download unauthorized portions of the Service
Circumvent or disable Service security measures

intellectualProperty.title: 5. Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.content1: The Service and its original content (except user-generated content), functionalities, and features are and will remain the exclusive property of Flipika and its licensors.
intellectualProperty.content2: The Service is protected by copyright, trademarks, and other laws. No part of the Service may be copied, modified, distributed, sold, or exploited without our prior written consent.

userData.title: 6. User Data
userData.content1: You retain ownership of any content you submit, post, or display via the Service. By submitting this content, you grant Flipika a worldwide, non-exclusive, transferable, sub-licensable, royalty-free license to use, copy, modify, distribute, and display this content within the scope of the Service.
userData.content2: You represent and warrant that: (i) you own the rights to the content or have the right to publish it, and (ii) the content does not violate the rights of third parties or applicable laws.

googleAdsAccounts.title: 7. Google Ads Accounts
googleAdsAccounts.content: When you connect your Google Ads accounts to Flipika, you authorize our platform to:
list: Access your advertising campaign data
Generate recommendations and optimizations based on your data
Apply optimizations to your campaigns with your consent

pricingBilling.title: 8. Pricing and Billing
pricingBilling.content1: The pricing terms of the Service are described on our website and may be modified at any time. Any change will be communicated before taking effect.
pricingBilling.content2: Invoices are payable upon receipt. In case of non-payment, Flipika reserves the right to suspend access to the Service until regularization.

termination.title: 9. Termination
termination.content1: We may suspend or terminate access to the Service immediately, without notice or liability, for any reason, including for violation of the Terms.
termination.content2: You may terminate your use of the Service at any time by closing your account or contacting support.

liability.title: 10. Limitation of Liability
liability.content1: Flipika shall not be held liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages, including loss of profits, data, or other intangible losses, resulting from your use or inability to use the Service.
liability.content2: We strive to maintain a high level of availability, but we do not guarantee uninterrupted or error-free access to the Service.

warrantyDisclaimer.title: 11. Warranty Disclaimer
warrantyDisclaimer.content1: The Service is provided "AS IS" and "AS AVAILABLE" without warranty of any kind. Flipika expressly disclaims all warranties, express or implied, including but not limited to implied warranties of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose, and non-infringement.
warrantyDisclaimer.content2: Flipika does not guarantee that: (i) the Service will be uninterrupted, secure, or error-free, (ii) the results obtained from the use of the Service will be accurate or reliable, (iii) the quality of products, services, information, or other materials purchased or obtained by you will meet your expectations.

changes.title: 12. Changes to Terms
changes.content: We reserve the right to modify these Terms of Service at any time. Modifications will be published on this page with the update date.

serviceChanges.title: 13. Modifications to the Service
serviceChanges.content: Flipika reserves the right to modify or discontinue, temporarily or permanently, the Service or any part thereof with or without notice. Flipika will not be liable to you or any third party for any modification, suspension, or discontinuation of the Service.

applicableLaw.title: 14. Applicable Law
applicableLaw.content: These Terms are governed by French law. In case of dispute, an amicable solution will be sought. Failing that, the Paris courts will be competent.

generalProvisions.title: 15. General Provisions
generalProvisions.content1: These Terms constitute the entire agreement between you and Flipika regarding the Service and supersede all prior or contemporaneous agreements, written or oral.
generalProvisions.content2: If any provision of these Terms is found to be invalid or unenforceable, the other provisions will remain in effect. The fact that Flipika does not exercise or enforce a right or provision does not constitute a waiver.

contact.title: 16. Contact
contact.content: For any questions regarding these Terms of Service, you can contact us at:
